content: with color b join with fpsc around top of any cluster working loosely 3 single_crochet around last ​ leg of cluster and the chain-3 space see photo fpsc around cluster eight times omitting last fpsc slip_stitch to first st 32 st round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st skip 1 st 5 double_crochet in next st skip 1 st single_crochet in next st seven times skip 1 ​ st 5 double_crochet in st single_crochet in single_crochet chain 3 skip 2 ​ st single_crochet in next double_crochet seven times chain 3 skip 2 st single_crochet in single_crochet chain 3 skip 2 st slip_stitch to first st
